name: UuultraC
description:
An 18+ BL visual novel set in 1970's Soshigaya.
Kaiju straight out of a black-and-white TV terrorize a Japan without a world's fair.
Tokyo's safety is in the hands of Sun Mask Icarus in this slapstick-yet-heavy 70's pro-wrestling kaiju drama!StoryMarch, 1970.
Shoutarou lives together with his boyfriend, Kozuka, in Soshigaya, Tokyo.
Society sees people turning into kaiju as an infectious disease. With one side protesting for acceptance of those infected, there is a restlessness in the air.
Shoutarou is an advocate for justice, but his life changes in a big way after he's drenched in kaiju blood.
There are kaiju, superheroes, giant robots, and three protagonists in this avant-garde tokusatsu drama filled with relics of the Showa Era.FeaturesTraditional Visual Novel
Developed by the same creator as Hashihime of Old Book Town
Over 1800 CGs to explore!
